Description:
Dream Starter!
Every now and then you come across a house that really feels like home. And this is it.
This home sits proudly on a generous 1/4 acre in the natural Avonsleigh surrounds with views into the hills of Wright's forest.
The front of the home features a generous veranda where you can sit and listen to the sounds of wildlife in the sunshine over your morning coffee.
The double colonial style sliding front doors welcome you into the light filled home with comfortable carpeted lounge room and neutral colour scheme. Beyond the lounge is a functional kitchen with plenty of bench space and adjoining dining area with windows that let the light in and provide views over the rear yard and into the distance.
The bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, are located along the hallway and serviced by the large main bathroom. The laundry is cleverly tucked away behind double doors in a contemporary European style.
There is also a study with stunning views that will inspire you to work or study hard to be your best, without the stress.
From the study is an exit that takes you onto a spacious covered timber deck with bistro blinds; the perfect place for entertaining with family and friends, watching the little ones play or just watching the continuous display of life thriving everywhere in such a majestic place.
The land is punctuated with tree ferns and native shrubs to encourage wildlife, and a healthy, maintained gum tree in the middle of the rear yard that is the envy of the town.
The home also features gas ducted heating, air conditioner, single lock up garage, single carport and garden shed.
Everything about this house feels like a home. Don't miss the opportunity to view.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
Period Home, Pool, and 2-Room Outbuilding
This charming character home is loaded with extras for a lovely lifestyle. With a delightful residence, external office and studio with WC, and inground pool and pool house with shower, this property is a peaceful getaway perfect for family living.
This impressive period residence with producing gardens boasts a beautiful blend of original and updated features and rests upon a level 2,770 sqm (approx.) block. At its heart is the sun-filled kitchen with freestanding SS cooker and peninsula seating. The lounge with floorboards and open wood fire is wonderfully relaxing, and the beautiful bedrooms, including the ensuite main with WIR and ornate fire, honour this home's history with high ceilings and shiplap walls. Ducted heating and evaporative cooling provide plenty of comfort inside, while the fruiting garden is a delight in every season.
For an adaptable property with a bounty of brilliant features, this home is certainly set to impress. Plan your inspection today.
- Level 2,770 sqm (approx.) block
- Character home with quality updates
- Adaptable home office and studio with WC
- Inground pool and pool house with shower
- Fabulous fruiting gardens
**Contact Agent for more information**
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office.

Description:
Fairview - Central Location, Views with Subdivision Potential!
You said you wanted central Emerald and you wanted views and you wanted some future development potential well here it is! With Puffing Billy chugging past on the rear boundary, it just adds to the ambience of this lovely character home which is perfectly located just a hop, skip and jump away from all the vibrant township of Emerald has to offer. You can walk into town, the Primary School, the park, the cafes and shops plus the bus connections to Belgrave. Set over two levels this 3 bedroom plus study character home consists upstairs of the main bedroom with walk-in robe, formal living space and an informal family room, timber kitchen with under bench oven, cooktop and a dishwasher and there is also a study on this level. The lower level has 2 further bedrooms and a bathroom/laundry combined. The large rear deck is covered and overlooks the allotment of just over ¼ of an acre with well-established trees and a great studio as well. You may even investigate the potential of future subdivision (Subject to Council Approval) and invest in a great home today and also for your future.
Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to discuss this property today.

Description:
HORSE AND GARDEN, A FINE COMBINATION ON FIVE ACRES
Set up to move in and enjoy the lifestyle here on offer with this beautiful Federation style home brimming with character appointments surrounded by established gardens featuring a greenhouse with herbs, roses, annuals, fruit trees, berries, vegetables, natives and mature trees and shrubs in abundance.
Equine lovers will surely be excited about the infrastructure here for riding, housing and enjoying your horses. Including: 3 stables with water, power and lighting, covered wash bay with water, lighting and power, 6 paddocks with wide lane access and electric fences, 4 with loose boxes, all with automated water troughs, 60 x 20m sand arena, tack storage, round yard, secure 6 x 12m hay/tack shed, workshop and horse float storage. You even have an option to purchase a brand new horse float! A bonus is a remote double garage with attic storage. Solar powered bespoke gates give a second access to the property, enabling a circular driveway. Upon inspection youll be able to fully appreciate the thoughtful way this property has been envisaged and realised by the owners.
The home itself has lovely references to yesteryear with quality finishes, high ceilings, ornate cornice, picture rails, ceiling roses, fretwork and timber floors. It features an old-style front porch overlooking a rose archway and garden, a large rear deck, perfect for outdoor dining. There are 3 bedrooms, the main with WIR and full ensuite, a family bathroom, also laundry. The centre of the home comprises of a large open plan lounge/ dining room adjoining the spacious country kitchen with stone benchtops, quality appliances and a fabulous island bench. A 5kw Solar power and storage system is installed to the shed roof and with solar hot water, the Electrical bills are minimised.
Macclesfield is a wonderful community to thrive in, its close to Emerald and Monbulk townships with schools and shops and a funky café/restaurant nearby, but just far enough away to enjoy the quintessential country lifestyle surrounded by beautiful views and peace and quiet. Enjoy a refreshment on the deck while keeping an eye out for the local Wedge-tailed eagles, Wallabies, Kookaburras and Echidnas who drop by to visit from time to time.
Youre sure to love living here. Call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 533 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange a time to show you through.
https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
You Couldn't Ask For More!
***AVAILABLE FOR VIEWING BY PRIVATE INSPECTION. CONTACT AARON DAY 0407 365 994 OR TYSON BLUHM 0437 843 820
For sale is this ideal family home in a quiet court location of Gembrook. Just an easy stroll to schools, shops, restaurants and public transport, this impeccably styled home makes living a breeze.
The sealed driveway and remote double garage provides comfortable car accommodation and has access directly into the home, onto a tiled hallway floor.
The open hallway begins at the front door where the spacious master bedroom is located, complete with well finished ensuite and good sized walk in robe.
Farther down the hallway and adjacent to the master, is the informal living area, reading room, office or spare bedroom with excellent natural light from the large windows.
The hallway then diverges into the main living zone featuring open plan kitchen, dining and lounge area.
The kitchen has an abundance of cupboard and bench space plus an island bench, and the dark tops provide a pleasing contrast to the white cabinetry and grey tiles.
There is a breakfast bar for informal dining, plus the adjoining dedicated space for a more formal meal. The lounge area is quality carpeted in a dark grey scheme, offsetting the lighter colours of the walls and tiles, and features windows that look over the secure rear yard.
Zoned away from the master are the remaining 2 bedrooms with built in robes, large main bathroom, laundry and separate toilet.
There is an additional undercover entertaining deck accessed from the dining area which is large enough for serving meals with friends and family on weekends.
The backyard is fully fenced and spacious so the family friendly game of backyard cricket can continue at Christmas.
Other features of the home include gas ducted heating, gas solar hot water & reverse cycle split system.
This home has all the comforts, designed for the growing family but equally comfortable for the childless couple or singles with family and friends that like to come and stay.
Houses of this calibre, with interest rates this low simply do not stay on the market for long.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Looking for Financial Freedom?
***AVAILABLE FOR VIEWING BY PRIVATE INSPECTION. CONTACT SAMANTHA SCOTT 0438 680 032***
An outstanding opportunity exists to secure a double brick veneer family home on a private 2.5 acres in sought after Clematis. Just an hour to Melbourne CBD, this property offers comfortable living with an opportunity for a future subdivision (STCA) so you can pay off your home loan and enjoy the financial freedom in one of Victorias most picturesque regions.
The home features 4 bedrooms, the master with walk in robe and ensuite, cleverly zoned away from the other bedrooms which are serviced by the generous main bathroom and separate toilet.
Centred between the formal dining room, informal meals area and main living room, the classic country style kitchen is the beating heart of the home. Timber cupboards, large pantry, 900mm oven and cooktop, and substantial bench space provide all comforts of the country cooking experience, championed by the ambient heat from the wood heater which disperses through the entirety of the home. Gorgeous doors lead from the dining room out to the paved entertaining area which can also be accessed from the laundry.
The second living area/rumpus room overlooks the entertaining area, making it a great area for younger kids to play while the parents relax with friends in the evenings.
Additionally, there is a separate office/studio with gas heating and power for the independent teenager, or the adult working from home.
The vehicles are taken care of with a large sealed driveway, double carport and double lock up garage, and there is an additional shed for the gardening tools.
The home is filled with light from the large windows that look out over the property and natural surroundings. The gardens filled with Australian natives to encourage the wildlife, some of which include Kookaburras, King Parrots and Wallabies.
This property is a great investment now but also provides the potential for so much more in the future. These opportunities are becoming more and more popular, so dont miss this one.
CALL Samantha Scott 0438 680 032 TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
WALK TO TOWN AND OPPOSITE EMERALD LAKE PARK
Start me up! What a great home for first home buyers, investors or downsizers on one of the best (sealed) streets in the lovely township of Emerald. Split level with vaulted ceilings and open plan in design this timber home has everything you need in a comfortable first home. A fresh and inviting colour palette, fabulous natural light and showcasing a country kitchen with the latest appliances, 2 large living spaces, 3 bedrooms the main with full ensuite plus a central family bathroom. The sun-drenched front deck is perfect for gatherings with family, in addition there is plenty of off-street parking and a carport that gives you covered access to the home plus a useable yard. It will be a joy to come home all year round with a wood fire, ducted heating and split system cooling to keep you comfortable. Walk into Emerald Township and join this wonderful community, or enjoy the myriad walking trails through the neighbouring 125 acre Emerald Lake Park and Nobelius Heritage park. Additionally, you can enjoy the cafes, restaurants, schools and transport that Emerald has to offer youll feel right at home.
Call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Emily Hudson 0418 570 474 to find out more.

Description:
EASY LIKE SUNDAY MORNING
Just the thing you were hoping would appear on the market, a 3-bedroom family home already renovated in an up to the minute style. Close to everything Emerald has to offer but hidden away on a private and quiet street amongst the gums. With nothing left to worry about you can move straight in and relax.
A fashionable monochrome colour spectrum has been deployed throughout giving the house an effortless appeal culminating in the shiny black spacious kitchen and adjoining dining room. The living area with split system features a large window looking out to the modern landscaping favouring yuccas and native grasses. The bathroom is white and bright and there is a separate toilet, laundry and loads of storage space so you can keep the lines clear and clutter-free.
The flat and fully fenced area immediately surrounding the house is brick paved and undercover front and back. It is a total winner for those with little children who can get outside and ride their trikes no matter what the weather. It is also a marvellous space indeed for entertaining (subject to restriction level!), whether under the cover or on the upper wooden terrace where you can watch the sunset over the ridge or feed the native birds.
The 2700m2 (approx) block also offers a double garage, double carport and a further shed and mature lemon, lime and olive trees.
Call Sue Colic on 0421 772 610.

Description:
OPPORTUNITY KNOCKS PRIVATE STREET, LOVELY OUTLOOK!
Here is your opportunity with this vacant block of land. Build your dream home (subject to council approval) on this ½ acre block, situated just out of town on a quiet street. If peace and quiet is what youre after and you want to escape the rat-race, here is the property for you. The block already has a sealed driveway to start you off on the journey.
As the old saying goes theyre not making any more land, so get in before it all runs out!
Please contract Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
Cedar Shingled Heart String Puller
Get ready to fall in love with your new home - the epitome of everything that beckons you to the hills: quirk, cosiness, character, views, a sense of space and, so important in this day and age; seclusion. Located near the old Emerald heritage golf course, an area famous for its European spring & autumn foliage that attracted city folk around the 1900's. Elm Crescent is one of a cluster of streets established around that time and holiday homes were built on the hillside, looking north across the Yarra Valley to the Warburton Ranges.
The home itself is Swiss Family Robinson meets fairytale castle meets English Homes & Garden interior magazine. So many beautiful places and windows to admire the view from and soak in that northerly light and that vitamin D3. Spread over two levels, there are lots of nooks and crannies to get creative with zoning and furnishing. The lounge, off the main open plan meals/living/dining, is a snuggle-heaven. The kitchen, while small, is practical and has potential to improve. A handy downstairs powder room incorporates the laundry.
Upstairs, past the first landing with access to the rear garden, the 2nd story greets you with a landing pad into all the bedrooms and main bathroom. The bedrooms comprise; one decent double, one perfect as a nursery/guest or study, the master with en-suite and a gigantic kid's/teen's/twenty-something's bedroom with play area/hang-out/dressing-room. The upstairs balcony provides even more panoramic scenery and is accessible from 3 of the bedrooms.
Lots of landscaped garden outdoor areas including the stunning front deck and side covered area as well as approx 1000m2 of paddock at the rear of the property waiting for a pony or some landscape design vision.
Call Sue Colic on 0421772610 to find out more and book your date with destiny!

Description:
Stunning 4 Bedroom + Studio on a Fantastic Block!
Conveniently located only 5 minutes drive to the Gembrook township, this stunningly renovated 4 bedroom home is a dream come true.
Set on almost 2/3 acre, the home invites you onto the front timber deck with feature planter box, inferring a quality that continues throughout the entire home.
Stepping into the living area you are immediately struck by the dark feature wall and contrasting floating floor which gives the room an atmosphere of warmth, championed by the large wood heater in the corner, making those chilly evenings a delight. The addition of a split system air conditioner keeps you cool in the summer so the family is comfortable all year round.
The huge master bedroom, zoned away from the other bedrooms, has massive built in robes and equally large ensuite which is both functional and aesthetic.
The living room diverges into the equally striking kitchen, where the light dances around the room with white cupboards, stainless steel appliances and white bench tops with bold red splash back tiles that achieve a gorgeous contrast.
The kitchen bench also serves as a breakfast bar into the adjoining dining area which is just as spacious and bright with a large window and double glass sliding doors.
The remaining bedrooms are all carpeted and robed and serviced by the main bathroom and separate toilet.
Accessed from both the meals area and living room, the river red timber entertaining deck is spacious and looks over the entire rear yard. The roof is insulated and has panels that allow the light to diffuse through without the heat.
Another attractive aspect of this property is the addition of a delightfully renovated bungalow which makes working from home not only easy, but enjoyable. Alternatively, use it as a teenagers retreat or home for aging parents.
There is a huge triple lock up garage with electric roller doors and enough room for a work shop and a cubby for the kids so everyones needs are taken care of.
Finally, this home is cheap to run with a massive 4 kW solar unit!
This property is a real delight and feels like home. Make an inquiry to secure your inspection today!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
Porte de Bleu A Garden Lovers Paradise
PRIVATE INSPECTIONS AVAILABLE ADHERING TO HYGIENE & SOCIAL DISTANCING GUIDELINES
An Australian masterpiece designed by Alistair Knox in 1978 close to shops, sporting facilities, schools and the cafe culture of Emerald, this family home is a triumph of reclaimed materials and environment harnessed to create a thermally efficient house full of beauty and whimsy. The house is built from mud bricks made on-site, complemented by recycled Oregon timbers and rustic brick floors. It sits peacefully and privately within covetable established gardens full of rare plants and artfully created mise en scène.
This home is jam-packed with passive house design features. The north-facing windows welcome the sun during the winter months and as the equinox arrives the home is shaded from the harsh summer heat. The signature Knox fireplace uses both radiant heat and convection ensuring the heat energy is retained and circulated. The chimney creates a heat bank that radiates warmth for hours. All of these factors combine to make the house naturally 5 - 10 degrees warmer or cooler depending on the season.
The kitchen blends the best of old and new with recent red cupboard doors and a converted gas Aga for real country hospitality as well as a 900 conventional freestanding gas cooker. Fanciful windows of salvaged leadlight have been used throughout the house, in the doors, the bathrooms, the cupboards, even in the woodshed! Wherever you look there is warmth and character built-in. The master bedroom enjoys a view of the exquisite garden as does every window in the house.
Step through the eponymous blue door and be transported into the art trail of a garden that feels endless and without effort - roses tumble over archways, meandering garden paths, a bridge that completes Monets Garden tableaux. Set amongst the bigger picture, you will find a more practical kitchen garden with chook shed or dog run, fruit and nut trees that include quince, lemons, limes, cherries, apples, pears, and kiwis. All nourished by 20,000 litres of tank water that supplies 1km of irrigation. With an option to tap into main water as well.
This house & garden is extraordinary. For a private tour please contact Katie Woods on 0428 744 498.

Description:
FILLED WITH CHARACTER, ONE ACRE, ROOM FOR THE WHOLE FAMILY
Shaded by 50-year-old conifers and chestnut trees this character laden residence is reminiscent of homes of a bygone era, 9 ft ceilings, ornate cornice, rosettes, arches and corbels, covered verandah, double hung windows, timber floors, tessellated tiles. Seamlessly eased into the modern era this 10-year-old home has all the modern comforts and fittings to afford the new owner a wonderful lifestyle in bustling Emerald Township.
The Interior:
4 light filled bedrooms all with BIRs, the main with WIR, ensuite with soaking tub, pedestal basin and a shower.
Family and dining room
Lounge room with gas effect log fire
Rumpus room
Chefs kitchen with stone benchtops and stainless-steel appliances
Spacious bathroom and laundry
Ducted heating and split systems x 2
The Outside:
1 acre of landscaped grounds
Beautiful covered verandah, gather in all seasons
Rear section fenced for children of 4-legged family members
Carport for 4 vehicles
Plenty of off-street parking via sealed driveway
This property is accessed by a sealed road and set in a slightly elevated position to take advantage of the treed outlook and is sure to tug at your heart strings. It will be a home that will be cherished and for your family to grow in and enjoy a wonderful lifestyle just minutes to Emerald and all the community has to offer.
Please call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432.

Description:
SMALL HORSE ACREAGE - 3 PLUS ACRES OF FLAT LAND, MINUTES TO GEMBROOK.
A classic timber homestead with a verandah out the front and an entertaining deck out the back is just some of the attractions of this nature lovers property. Currently set up as a horse property with two paddocks, double stable, tack room, electric fencing, feed shed and a 9.6 x 7.8 shed for the horse float, you can bring your equine friends and comfortably move straight in. Riding in the picturesque Kurth Kiln regional park is sure to become a favourite.
If you are just looking for a few acres and a relaxed and happy home, its best you look at this 3-bedroom residence with two bathrooms, two separate living areas and serviceable kitchen. The classic country style of exposed timbers, slate, dado panelling is featured throughout. On the allotment there are multiple sheds, a bungalow, 2 huge garages and plenty of parking spaces.
Imagine coming home from a stressful day, pulling into your home, pouring an ice cold beverage and sitting on your front verandah listening to chattering birds, neighing horses, a bustling wombat, maybe a slow moving echidna meandering past and the King Parrots popping in for their daily feed. Is there anything better. Its peaceful, its quiet here, youll love the natural surrounds.
The pretty township of Gembrook is just minutes away, there you can enjoy a great coffee, maybe brunch, shop at the local IGA and bakery. This tree change lifestyle is just waiting for you to visit, please call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to chat about making this your new home.

Description:
ALMOST AN ACRE OF FLAT OPEN LAND IN CENTRAL EMERALD
Superbly located in a no-through road just a stones throw from Central Emerald, this flat and sunny 3485m2 block is absolutely ideal for your next home. This location is a premium and very few homes become available in this tightly held spot.
The low maintenance brick and tile home offers 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a central living room with separate kitchen.
Outside there is a 4 car garage plus a separate single garage also available with a separate driveway ideal for boat, caravan or trailer, or all of them!
Ideally located near Worrell Reserve, Tennis Club, Woolworths and all the shops and transport. Opportunities like this in this street do not come around very often, so dont delay, as this property will sell!
Please contract Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432 to arrange your inspection today.

Description:
OPEN PLAN, BRICK WITH GARAGE ON A 1/3 OF AN ACRE. PRICED TO PLEASE!!
*** OFFERS CLOSING 5pm WEDNESDAY 3rd JUNE***
Surely this one should be on top of your list. Split level brick home with a double garage featuring interior access (no more wet shopping or children), 2 separate living spaces, one with wood heater, a huge rear deck covered for year- round entertaining. The main bedroom is large, with a full ensuite, 2 double built in robe and a spacious walk-in-robe as well. The remaining bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by the family bathroom with bath and shower. Avid chefs will love the size of the kitchen with crisp white cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, a wall oven and marble effect bench tops. In addition, the laundry is spacious, there is ducted heating and a fenced rear yard that has established gardens and is useable, ideal for kids and the family fur babies. Privately located, walking distance to Emerald township with its shops, schools and transport what more could you want!
We are looking forward to showing you this exciting property just minutes to Emerald Township.
Call Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 to arrange a private appointment or to find out more.

Description:
A BIG HOME ON OVER 1 ACRE IN CENTRAL EMERALD
Located close to the centre of Emerald with sealed road access is this large family home spanning two levels that offers every member of the family their own space. Open plan living on the first level combines a large timber kitchen with 900mm cooker, dishwasher and walk in pantry, roomy meals area, living room and mezzanine area that overlooks the main living space. There are 5 bedrooms in total, the master with ensuite and another bedroom which would also make a great study are on the lower level along with a separate living area providing privacy. The remaining bedrooms are serviced by the family bathroom. The extensive use of timber adds to the feeling of warmth and welcome and includes polished floor boards. A solid fuel fire provides a favourite place to sit on cooler evenings and ducted heating will heat the entire home. There is a lovely decked area that is a great vantage point to take in the sights and sounds of an abundance of colourful birds that visit. With 4977m2 of land there is plenty of grassed area that caters to outdoor activities, a double carport and a huge garage with concrete floor, power and toilet that is accessed from the rear of the property providing two road access. All within easy reach of our highly regarded Primary School, kindergarten and child minding facilities as well as a variety of eateries, parks and walking trails and shopping centre, this is a property that will allow you to live the country lifestyle you crave with every convenience at your fingertips.

Description:
A SOUND INVESTMENT IN YOUR FUTURE ON ALMOST ¾ ACRE
Nestled on 2948m2 this solid brick home offers all of the privacy you desire and the convenience of made road access. The spacious living area features timber lined cathedral ceilings that add a sense of space, open fire place and hardwood polished floors. The timber kitchen has an adjoining meals area that also benefits from the high timber lined ceilings; a door from this section leads out to a covered outdoor area. There are 3 bedrooms, the master with full ensuite and on the upper level there is a study/4th bedroom. The enormous family bathroom comes complete with a bath. There is ducted heating throughout and solar panels to help with your costs. Surrounded by leafy established gardens that include tree ferns the garden is home to an abundance of colourful native birds. Situated within easy reach of walking trails that go for kilometres and a short drive to Emerald central or Monbulk, this is a property that offers the very best of country living.

Description:
Flat ½ acre, Updated Interior, 4 Bedrooms
This property has a great list of features sure to entice you and the family:
4 bedrooms
2 bathrooms, both renovated with the latest on trend fittings
Fantastic updated kitchen with SS 900mm stove, DW & farmhouse sink
Separate lounge & dining rooms
Undercover entertaining
Garage, shed, carport, plenty of parking
Rear access
Continuous hot water
Wall heater and wood heater
Rural aspect yet minutes to Gembrook Township.
You are certain to put this fantastic home at the top of your list. Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 are looking forward to showing you through.

Description:
PRIVACY, QUALITY, 7000m2 FLAT LAND AND TENNIS COURT
The Setting:
Positioned away from prying eyes, follow the long driveway under the canopy of old growth trees and approach the home. Sitting on just over 7000 m2 of flat grassed lawns this brick veneer home proudly welcomes you to an envious lifestyle.
The Space:
Large living rooms blessed with natural light present themselves. A stunning Smith & Smith kitchen with superb cabinetry and timber benches feature a Falcon cooker, which showcases the hub of the home. Large glass windows throughout both living areas showcase beautifully landscaped gardens whilst the gas fireplace offers a fantastic ambience inside. The five bedrooms are serviced by two bathrooms, one a full ensuite to the main wing that boasts custom cabinetry as a wall of BIRs. One bedroom is currently utilised as a home office, you may like to investigate that for your home business requirements
Outdoor & Indoor Amenities:
Amongst the beautifully established gardens youll find a BBQ patio overlooking a tennis court, four carports, workshop, wood store, amazing old growth trees, various fruit trees and lush green lawns. The residence offers ducted heating with air filtration for those with allergies, split system, gas log fire and integrated dishwasher.
The Location:
Near to schools and sporting clubs, pony club, walk to the Avonsleigh General Store and dining at Bam Bam restaurant and Emerald Township is close by.
To Arrange a Viewing:
Call Mick Dolphin: 0429 684 522 or Janet Hawkins on 0409 117 432
https://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
An Exceptional Horse Property On 13 Acres!
Perfectly located in the picturesque Hills town of Macclesfield is this absolutely magnificent 13 acre (approx) horse property that needs to be seen to be truly appreciated. From the moment that you arrive you are sure to fall in love with this property that has been designed to cater to a horse enthusiasts every need. There are 8 separate paddocks all with water, and electric fencing (Electro braid). The spacious front paddock has a gated shelter and a horse float shelter. There is a huge machinery shed, under cover horse wash, sand day yard, tack room, hay shed and 2 separate loose boxes with day yards. The perfectly presented brick home offers 3 bedrooms master with ensuite, plus a study, 2 updated bathrooms, central light and bright kitchen with dishwasher and open plan lounge and dining room. Special features include ducted gas heating, as well as a Coonara wood heater and a split system. With a great horse riding trail that leads from the property to the local Pony Club grounds you can enjoy pleasure riding or for the more serious equestrian pursuits, you can take advantage of the facilities in the pony club grounds. This is an exceptional and sought after horse property!
